title: Pascal Fages
text:
Pascal Fages is a French former professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who represented <a href="France%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">France</a> at the <a href="1995%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">1995 World Cup</a>. 
Background.
Pascal Fages is the father of the rugby league footballer; <a href="Th%C3%A9o%20Fages">Théo Fages</a>.
